properties.body:
NORTH SEA.
ENGLAND.
DNC 20, DNC 21.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
   BY M/V FUGRO GALAXY IN AREA BOUND BY
   52-21.3N 001-44.4E, 52-30.4N 002-43.8E,
   52-45.1N 002-44.4E, 52-46.3N 003-02.8E,
   51-58.3N 002-16.2E, 52-08.4N 001-39.1E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1864/21.
